transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+4% Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+4% Critical Damage
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Spear Barrage
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000049_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000049_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Blitz Commander's Spite
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000049_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000049_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Skill: Painful Demise
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>missing Health</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>missing Health</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict Bleeding on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000049_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Bleeding on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000049_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000049_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000049_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
